text: Ej Rasul, ʙaroi musrikon ʙigu: «Ojo sarikonero, ki ʙa coi Allohi jakto mexonded, dided? Ba man nison dihed, ki az zamin ci cizro ofaridaand? Jo in ki dar ofarinisi osmon sirkate dorand? Ojo ʙar on musrikho kitoʙe az osmon firistodaem, ki onro dar kori sirk va ʙutparastiason huccati xud sozand? Balki, haq in ast, ki sitamkoron ʙa jakdigar cuz fireʙ va'dae namedihand»
